title: Inflation lower than anticipated, lender benefits

content.prompt: A lender will realize unexpected benefit when the

choices.label: actual inflation rate is higher than the anticipated inflation rate
actual inflation rate is lower than the anticipated inflation rate
rate of interest is greater than the actual rate of inflation
rate of interest is less than the actual rate of inflation
rate of interest equals the actual rate of inflation

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
